医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现咖啡和咖啡因促进新陈代谢并提高运动表现研究表明，咖啡和咖啡因可增强新陈代谢和运动表现，对心率、能量消耗、减脂和胰岛素敏感性产生不同的影响，对运动员和整体健康产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Coffee-and-caffeine-boost-metabolism-and-enhance-exercise-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Coffee-and-caffeine-boost-metabolism-and-enhance-exercise-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30e55ce0-7336-403f-b57f-a4bd2a61085b Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:15:00 -0500 Coffee and caffeine boost metabolism and enhance exercise performance, study finds
危机中的新鲜食品：妇女团体如何在封锁期间传递希望和蔬菜2020 年 3 月，印度政府在提前四小时通知的情况下宣布实行严格封锁，其中包括禁止 80% 至 90% 的印度人主要食物来源所依赖的非正式和传统食品店。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Fresh-food-in-a-crisis-How-womens-groups-delivered-hope-and-vegetables-during-lockdown.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Fresh-food-in-a-crisis-How-womens-groups-delivered-hope-and-vegetables-during-lockdown.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af16cc79-15c0-4a1c-8de9-9a4fadce06d9 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:09:58 -0500 Fresh food in a crisis: How women's groups delivered hope and vegetables during lockdown
SURMOUNT-4 试验中替泽帕肽维持体重减轻并改善心脏代谢健康事实证明，目前的抗肥胖药物对于消除多余的体重非常有效。然而，由威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会医院的研究人员领导的一项三期随机临床试验发现，停止服用该药物的人在一年内恢复了大部分体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Tirzepatide-maintains-weight-loss-and-improves-cardiometabolic-health-in-SURMOUNT-4-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Tirzepatide-maintains-weight-loss-and-improves-cardiometabolic-health-in-SURMOUNT-4-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=807f2390-5abb-4d58-b33b-7625ec578d84 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 22:14:00 -0500 Tirzepatide maintains weight loss and improves cardiometabolic health in SURMOUNT-4 trial
合生元配方有望减少长期新冠症状研究发现，合生制剂 SIM01 可显着减轻患者的急性 COVID-19 综合征症状，包括疲劳、记忆问题和胃肠道不适，表明其作为长期 COVID 治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Synbiotic-formula-shows-promise-in-reducing-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Synbiotic-formula-shows-promise-in-reducing-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abdcc9b5-6c5c-4d76-a1d5-5c331f99b226 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 22:12:00 -0500 Synbiotic formula shows promise in reducing long COVID symptoms
研究揭示轮状病毒引起腹泻的新机制轮状病毒会引起胃肠炎，包括腹泻、营养吸收不足和体重减轻。严重病例每年导致全世界约 128,000 名婴儿和儿童死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-reveals-new-mechanism-by-which-rotavirus-induces-diarrea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-reveals-new-mechanism-by-which-rotavirus-induces-diarrea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee676204-f00e-4302-8b6c-dbb240027f65 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 21:57:05 -0500 Study reveals new mechanism by which rotavirus induces diarrhea
研究发现坚果作为零食替代品可促进年轻人的代谢健康研究发现，在年轻人的饮食中用坚果代替典型的碳水化合物零食 16 周可以改善代谢健康，女性腰围和脂质生物标志物减少，男性胰岛素敏感性增强，而无需其他饮食改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-finds-tree-nuts-as-snack-alternative-boost-metabolic-health-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-finds-tree-nuts-as-snack-alternative-boost-metabolic-health-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3b2a244-5bf6-44e0-a29d-378b4ddeb488 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 21:54:00 -0500 Study finds tree nuts as snack alternative boost metabolic health in young adults
研究：死于癌症的风险取决于你住在英格兰的地方根据《柳叶刀肿瘤学》发表的一项研究，英国男性和女性死亡人数最多的 10 种癌症的死亡风险因人们居住的地区而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-Risk-of-dying-from-cancer-depends-on-where-you-live-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-Risk-of-dying-from-cancer-depends-on-where-you-live-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35559ac9-c709-4837-975a-883c57a88b45 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 21:22:09 -0500 Study: Risk of dying from cancer depends on where you live in England
B细胞淋巴瘤的双重打击：CAR T细胞创新提高疗效，降低毒性马拉汉医学研究所与惠灵顿兆泰疗法有限公司合作今天宣布了其新型第三代抗 CD19 嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞疗法的 1 期剂量递增试验结果，该疗法将在美国癌症学会上发表血液学 (ASH) 年会于 12 月 11 日下午 3 点在圣地亚哥举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Double-punch-for-B-cell-lymphomas-CAR-T-cell-innovation-boosts-efficacy-cuts-toothity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Double-punch-for-B-cell-lymphomas-CAR-T-cell-innovation-boosts-efficacy-cuts-toothity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12847997-8a04-4db7-8c14-4d1f724bb1e7 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 21:06:17 -0500 Double punch for B-cell lymphomas: CAR T-cell innovation boosts efficacy, cuts toxicity
现代疗法使黑人白血病患者的存活率大幅上升宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院和宾夕法尼亚大学医学院艾布拉姆森癌症中心的研究人员在第 65 届美国学会上发表的一项研究表明，随着新疗法的出现，患有急性髓性白血病 (AML) 的非西班牙裔黑人患者的寿命更长了血液学 (ASH) 年会和博览会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Survival-rates-of-black-病人-with-leukemia-soar-with-modern-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Survival-rates-of-black-病人-with-leukemia-soar-with-modern-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dc36cb3-3c54-493b-b4d1-54c9cf0d7127 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:59:35 -0500 Survival rates of black patients with leukemia soar with modern therapies
生酮饮食被证明可有效控制多囊肾病官方消息：在第一个生酮代谢疗法治疗 PKD 的随机对照临床试验中，生酮饮食被证明可以有效控制多囊肾病 (PKD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Ketogenic-diet-proved-to-be- effective-at-controlling-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Ketogenic-diet-proved-to-be- effective-at-controlling-polycystic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a5a641e-043d-4be6-8b77-d90a9b2ec903 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 20:40:56 -0500 Ketogenic diet proved to be effective at controlling polycystic kidney disease
